Dialogue.Page: Well, I just stepped out of the white hole and... wow, what a place to arrive!
Pleasant, humid, breathable air, warm sand, lapping waves... this place is a paradise!
Good thing I brought this raft!
I wouldn't mind staying here for a little while...
Oh yeah, observations! Uh... the sun here seems quite similar to our own.
I appear to be standing on a moon based on the low gravity and absolutely massive gas giant in the sky.
I can see other planets in the distance, and even another star that seems quite close!
I should look around a bit.
